description: Stagleap Provincial Park at Kootenay Pass is a great area for backcountry skiing and hiking.See topographic Map: 82F/3 Elevation gain: 200 meters to ridge.Ripple Ridge cabin is at 1952m at  11U 497550 5431990 and nearby are nice slopes near Baldy rocks ridge if you head toward: 11U 497448 5432391.In winter please check avalance conditions.
directions: Park at Kootenay Pass on highway #3 at 1772m. Start at junction of Hwy 3 and Stagleap Forest Service Road. This road is closed to skidoo traffic, ski up the road some 3km to the ridgeline and there is a cabin nearby, only sleeps 4.
title: Ripple Ridge
